title: Introducing: Pole Siblings
content:
I’m such a sucker for Beach House style woozy indie-pop, and Finnish duo Pole Siblings (Sofia & Johan Stolpe) know exactly how to push my buttons.

With a solitary track on their Soundcloud, uploaded the best part of five years ago, they’re now gearing up to release their debut EP, featuring stunning lead track, Ghosts. The absolute definition of ethereal, Ghosts would feel at home on any Beach House record, yet also manages to lean slightly further toward anthemic at points, existing entirely within a space of its own. Check out Ghosts below.
